mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User_Accounts ( user_id, account_number, account_name, category, balance, last_updated, created_at, institution_code, bank_name ) VALUES ( #{account.userId}, #{account.accountNumber}, #{account.accountName}, #{account.category}, #{account.accountBalance}, NOW(), #{account.accountStartDate}, #{account.institutionCode}, #{account.bankName} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE balance = VALUES(balance), bank_name = VALUES(bank_name), last_updated = NOW()
